title: #441 Korea Was Hell with Chris Alan
itunes:title: Korea Was Hell with Chris Alan
description:
Comedian and Air Force vet Chris Alan came over to tell me, famous draft dodger, about his time in the armed forces. It’s waaaay different than what you see in movies. It was a funny and super interesting podcast about the gruntwork side of war. 

Follow Chris:

Instagram 

Twitter 

Listen to his new album, "Off Script"

For more Ari:

The Music:

Jimmie Osborne - Thank God For Victory In Korea

Cake - I Bombed Korea

The Air Force Song

Black Sabbath - War Pigs
